did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.unittitle: John H. A. Cooper Store Ledger 1906-1927
did.abstract: Ledger, 1906-1927, kept at Star Tannery, Va. (Frederick County, Va.) by John H. A. Cooper. The ledger is #3. The store sold Pratts Stock and Poultry Feed. Included with the ledger are some loose letters, and advertisements.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open to all researchers.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Before quoting, please get permission from the copyright holder and the Special Collections Research Center, Earl Gregg Swem Library, College of William and Mary.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: John H. A. Cooper Star Tannery, Va. Ledger (Mss. Acc. 2008.12) Special Collections Research Center, Swem Library, College of William and Mary.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The materials were acquired by Special Collections Research Center on 02/27/2008.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: John H. A. Cooper lived at Star Tannery, Va. (in Frederick County). He farmed and ran a country store.  Further information about this individual or organization may be available in the Special Collections Research Center Wiki: http://scrc.swem.wm.edu/wiki/index.php/John H. A. Cooper.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Ledger, 1906-1927, kept at Star Tannery, Va. (Frederick County, Va.) by John H. A. Cooper. The ledger is #3. The store sold Pratts Stock and Poultry Feed. Included with the ledger are some loose letters, and advertisements.

controlaccess.head: Index Terms
controlaccess.p: This Collection is indexed under the following controlled access subject terms.
